plot: Relations between Marguerite, a pretty black-and-white cow, and her friend, an elegant young woman, have taken a turn for the odd... In the spacious barn where Marguerite stoically eats her...
title: Marguerite
plot_es: Relations between Marguerite, a pretty black-and-white cow, and her friend, an elegant young woman, have taken a turn for the odd... In the spacious barn where Marguerite stoically eats her...
